definitions.text: having or showing arrogant superiority to and disdain of those one views as unworthy; ; ; ; ; ; ; - W.L.Shirer
examples: some economists are disdainful of their colleagues in other social disciplines
very sniffy about breaches of etiquette
his mother eyed my clothes with a supercilious air
a more swaggering mood than usual

definitions.text: joyful and proud especially because of triumph or success
examples: rejoicing crowds filled the streets on VJ Day
